name: Christmas Carnage (Webster Game Design)
description:
It’s December 24th, and Christmas spirit is at an all-time high, but a series of unfortunate events has led to a shortage of Christmas trees all throughout the quaint little town of Choptn’. Now, as a last resort, the people have resorted to your home, stealing your neighbors, friends, and family. Can you survive this year’s Christmas Carnage?

Character Description:

  • Name: John McPine
  • Age: 16 Trunk Rings
  • Height: 1.3 Grinches
  • Favorite Movie: “Love Acc-tree-ly”
